Description: Painted limestone seated figure of Ninefertmin; Hieroglyphic text on the sides of the block-seat.
Curator's comments: Published: S Birch, Catalogue of the collection of Egyptian Antiquities at Alnwick Castle (London, 1880), 73 (no. 516). W. Seipel, Ägypten Vol. 1, Linz 1989, p.66 [36]. See PM viii, p. 302.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1990 20 Oct-9 Dec, Japan, Tokyo, Setagaya Art Museum, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.44 1991 5 Jan-20 Feb, Japan, Yamaguchi, Prefectural Museum of Art, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.44 1991 9 Mar-7 May, Japan, Osaka, National Museum of Art, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.44 1997 13 Oct-1998 5 Jan, India, New Delhi, National Museum, The Enduring Image 1998 9 Feb-3 May, India, Mumbai, Sir Caswasjee Jahangir Hall, The Enduring Image
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Hugh Algernon Percy, 10th Duke of Northumberland
